description: This API checks whether a given shop_id is eligible to enroll in the Brazil Fulfiled by Shopee (FBS) service

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to call APIs. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api_path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id, shop_enrollment_status_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm.

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if ret error. Empty if no error happened.

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if ret error. Empty if no error happened.

response_fields.name: shop_id
response_fields.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop

response_fields.name: enrollment_status
response_fields.description:
1: enable enrollment
2: disable enrollment
3: already enrollment

response_fields.name: enable_enrollment_time
response_fields.description: The time of this shop able to enroll FBS

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking
